title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: Upon resizing the Control Example window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
OB: When running the Control Example, if the window is resized vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash when the Control Example window is resized vertically.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
